description:
An excellent all-around PFD for older children who have outgrown the need for head pillow support. The fabric is designed to resist stains, and the segmented foam flexes for easy movement.

  • Ultra-soft, stain resistant fabric
  • Segmented foam provides great fit and freedom of movement
  • Ventilated mesh back and wicking liner for coolness
  • Child size for 13-25kg (33-55lbs)
  • Youth size 25-40kg (55-88lbs)
  • Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard
name: Mustang Survival Rev Foam Vest - Children to Youths
